title: 2018-04-23 - Muhstik Botnet Exploits Highly Critical Drupal Bug
plain_text:
# Muhstik Botnet Exploits Highly Critical Drupal Bug

**[threatpost.com/muhstik-botnet-exploits-highly-critical-drupal-bug/131360/](https://threatpost.com/muhstik-botnet-exploits-highly-critical-drupal-bug/131360/)**

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)

## Discussion

This is only the beginning. Drupal users better PATCH in a hurry.


-----

Drupal should just throw in the towel. Honestly my impression on their ability to keep
their platform secure, is slim. At this point - they are worse than Worpress. Always
something negative about Drupal in the news.
